New Records: Florian Wirtz scored Germany's fastest international goal after seven seconds.
Key Match Events: Florian Wirtz scored Germany's fastest international goal after seven seconds.
Kai Havertz scored the second goal for Germany at the 49th minute.
Niclas Füllkrug won a free kick for Germany in the 90'+3' minute.
Post-Match Reflections: Germany earned a confidence-boosting 2-0 friendly victory over France.
This was Germany's first win in their last four games.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Groupama Stadium in Lyon, France.
